about_the_game:
The Jackbox Party Pack 2: Soundtrack features all of the music from the sequel to the original party game phenomenon, The Jackbox Party Pack. 58 tracks of wackiness that offer a little something for every occasion (epecially if your occasions are really weird). Download The Jackbox Party Pack 2: Soundtrack today. Your earholes will thank you!

Credits

Music for Earwax, Fibbage 2, Quiplash XL and Bomb Corp. by Andy Poland

Music for Bidiots by Randy Sly*

*except where noted
